entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High zero.

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning in the morning. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
